sources.title: The Veteran | Full Vietnam War Drama Movie
sources.description:
**This film is under non-exclusive license from APL Film. All rights reserved**

Thirty years after the fall of Saigon, politician Ray Watson returns to Vietnam to lay his demons to rest, but he is confronted by a POW he left behind who forces him to relive the day of their capture.

2006
Stars: Ally Sheedy, Bobby Hosea, Michael Ironside

Welcome to Movie Central. Subscribe and watch more Awesome Movies!

metadata.Plot: A soldier returning from the war in Afghanistan uncovers a conspiracy involving the intelligence services and a gang of drug dealers.
metadata.Actors: Toby Kebbell, Adi Bielski, Tony Curran
